entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Orillia
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:12 AM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -7.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Lake Simcoe Regional Airport 12:00 PM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023

Pressure / Tendency: 102.2 kPa rising
Humidity: 70 %

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of light snow. High minus 4. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of light snow. Wind becoming east 30 km/h gusting to 50 this afternoon. High minus 4. Wind chill near minus 13. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow at times heavy. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Amount 10 to 20 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 8. Wind chill near minus 17. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of light snow. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow with risk of freezing drizzle. Wind east 30 km/h becoming light in the afternoon. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 17 in the morning and minus 9 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023
